summary: Error trying to fold var statement inside an if

comments.content:
The following js input to the compiler will raise an exception (I think trying to turn the left hand side 
of the expression in the else into a string):

if (a) { var b = 1; } else { a.b = 1; }

The error is raised at, calling the getString on name2:

http://code.google.com/p/closure-
compiler/source/browse/trunk/src/com/google/javascript/jscomp/FoldConstants.java#792
